title: Eeyore's Requiem Recipe
full_text:
Eeyore's Requiem Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
3 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1 1/2
ounces
Campari
1/2
ounce
Tanqueray
gin
1/4
ounce
Cynar
1/4
ounce
Fernet Branca
1
ounce
Dolin Blanc
Vermouth
15
drops
orange bitters
(Fee's, Regan's, or a mix)
3
orange twists
Directions
Fill a mixing glass with ice, add Campari, Tanqueray, Cynar, Fernet, vermouth, and bitters. Stir until well chilled and strain into serving glass. Twist orange peel over drink to to express oils and discard.
Special Equipment
Mixing glass,
strainer
